meanings.definition: A small area of trees and bushes
meanings.sent1: The children played hide-and-seek in the spinney.
meanings.sent2: The birds built their nests in the cozy spinney.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel got lost in the spinney and couldn't find its way out!
meanings.sent4: The spinney was a green oasis in the middle of the city.
meanings.sent5: The spinney rustled with the sound of leaves in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: To move quickly in a circle or around an axis
meanings.sent1: The dancer began to spinney gracefully on the stage.
meanings.sent2: The top started to spinney faster and faster.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to spinney around in circles chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: Her mind started to spinney with all the new information she was learning.
meanings.sent5: The carousel made the children laugh as they spinneyed around.
